item.description:
We will be hiking Mts Little Haystack, Mt. Lincoln and Mt. Lafayette loop. Please read the below hike description before deciding to sign up.

It is each and every individuals responsibility to read and agree to the liability/waiver posted on this site. It is also the responsibility of each and every individual to adhere to the hikers responsibility outlined on this website.

Please note that we are meeting in the Northbound lane of the Lafayette Place Parking lot.

Mt. Lafayette, Mt. Lincoln, Little Haystack Mtn.

Mountains: Little Haystack Mtn. (4760'), Mt. Lincoln (5089'), Mt. Lafayette (5260')
Trails: Falling Waters Trail, Franconia RidgeTrail, Greenleaf Trail, Old Bridle Path, Appalachian Trail
Region: NH - Central East
Franconia Notch State Park
Location: Franconia, NH
Rating: Difficult
Features: Summits, views, cascades, hut, brook, 4000-footers, loop hike
Distance: 8.8 miles
Elevation Gain: 3860 feet (cumulative)
Hiking Time: Actual: 7:30 Typical: 7:20


Route Summary

This is a loop hike starting and ending at the Lafayette Place parking area.


• Start out on Falling Waters Trail (which for the first 0.2 mile is also the same trail as the Old Bridle Path).
• After 0.2 mile, turn right to stay on Falling Waters Trail and follow that until its on Little Haystack Mountain, 3.2 miles from the parking area.
• From the end of Falling Waters Trail, turn left onto Franconia Ridge Trail.
• Follow Franconia Ridge Trail 0.7 mile up to the summit of Mt. Lincoln.
• Continue on Franconia Ridge Trail, down the other side of Mt. Lincoln, for 0.9 which will put you on Mt. Lincoln's summit.
• From Mt. Lincoln, turn left to descend on Greenleaf Trail.
• Follow Greenleaf Trail for 1.1 miles until reaching Greenleaf Hut and Eagle Lakes.
• Turn left to get on Old Bridle Path.
• Follow Old Bridle Path for 2.9 miles all the way back to the parking lot (upon reaching the junction with Falling Waters Trail, turn right).


Falling Waters Trailhead (1780') 0.0 0.0 0:00 0:00
Little Haystack Mtn. summit (4760') 3.2 3.2 3:00 3:00
Mt. Lincoln summit (5089') 0.7 3.9
Mt. Lafayette summit (5260') 0.9 4.8 1:00 4:00
Greenleaf Hut/Eagle Lake (4220') 1.1 5.9
Old Bridle Path trailhead (1780') 2.9 8.8 3:30 7:30
item.name: Lincoln - Lafayette loop
